attributes.action: have MPs pay set by the National Federation of Old Age Pensioners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MPs pay is a thorny subject (especially for MPs)... it would increase transparency if MPs were not allowed to set their own pay, Instead, it would be set by a panel drawn from our Old Age Pensioners.

It might also concentrate the minds of MPs a little more whilst setting Old Age Pensions.
